changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE entity_schema.order ( id BIGINT DEFAULT nextval('entity_schema.order_id_seq') PRIMARY key, car_id BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL CHECK (status IN ('CREATED', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED')), order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (car_id) REFERENCES entity_schema.car (car_id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES entity_schema.user (user_id) )
